comments: Her accent definitely keeps you captivated but apart from that the material is interesting and she has a lot of funny anecdotes. Shows videos/animations on Friday that are helpful but also enlightening! Quite hard to catch outside of class because shes busy. My only complain was the exam, which had a slew of random super duper specific questions
